name: Project Cowboy Hell
description:
Project Cowboy Hell (PCH) is my final year university project.  I'm posting it here to make the project easily shareable

The game is a 2D Metroidvania/roguelike with a western/hell theme.  Sadly most of the art & sound within the game were cancelled due to time constraints in favour of completing the core functionality of the game. 

The major technical focus of this project is the editor, the editor interacts with an SQLite database allowing the player to change many aspects of the game, like adding new items, editing player stats and much more.

if you wish to see the code for this project it's all publically available on GitHub here: https://github.com/NotErikk/Project-Cowboy-Hell

The project and its documentation got me a grade of 87/100 and I finished uni with a first!

Thanks for taking the time to visit this page!

-Erik
